channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: This Bluetooth speaker’s battery life impressed me in testing, but it’s irredeemably bad in one vital respect
item.description: The AO mini portable wireless speaker offers relentless battery life but its tinny sound lacks bass and oomph

item.title: Venmo launches cash back rewards program for debit cards
item.description: Venmo launches a cash back program for debit card users, as credit card use declines among Gen Z.

item.title: « Votre esprit est très facilement manipulable » par des compagnons IA, alerte le patron de Perplexity
item.description: Les « compagnons IA » séduisent des millions d’utilisateurs en quête d’écoute et de réconfort, quitte à brouiller la frontière entre réel et virtuel. Une dérive que le patron de Perplexity, Aravind Srinivas, juge dangereuse pour l’esprit humain.

item.title: La Chine ne veut pas de ces applications de rencontres gay sur iPhone, Apple s’exécute
item.description: Apple retire deux applications de rencontres homosexuelles très populaires de son App Store chinois suite à une demande du gouvernement.

item.title: Major AI agents are being spoofed - and it could put your site at risk
item.description: Bad bots are trawling the web, impersonating legitimate agents to get permissions, experts warn.

item.title: BYD explique pourquoi les batteries de ses voitures électriques sont totalement dépourvues de cobalt
item.description: Le constructeur chinois BYD réaffirme sa confiance absolue dans la technologie lithium-fer-phosphate, alors que certains concurrents lorgnent vers d'autres solutions. Une prise de position qui témoigne d'une vision à long terme où la sécurité prime sur la course à l'autonomie.

item.title: How Zero Trust can help organizations manage mounting agentic AI security risk
item.description: As agentic AI expands in enterprises, aligning security with innovation is more critical than ever.

item.title: The First Radio Signal From Comet 3I/Atlas Ends the Debate About Its Nature
item.description: An observatory detected the first radio signal from the interstellar object 3I/Atlas. Here's what it means.

item.title: I used AI to predict prices of Amazon's 20 most popular SSDs for Black Friday and it doesn't look good at all
item.description: Gemini predicts Black Friday SSD discounts will be modest, with few major price drops across Amazon’s top 20 drives.

item.title: Le Black Friday débarque en avance sur les vélos électriques : les offres les plus intéressantes du moment
item.description: Les premières offres du Black Friday sont tombées bien en avance cette année et sur tous les domaines. Les vélos électriques bénéficient eux aussi de promotions et c'est ce que nous vous dévoilons dans notre sélection des meilleures offres de VAE.

item.title: Pluribus easily had the best TV premiere of 2025, but Apple TV still messed up one infuriating detail
item.description: Two episodes down and Pluribus is universally incredible TV, but that doesn’t mean Apple TV gets off the hook for including a disappointing stereotype.

item.title: La version 15 pouces du récent MacBook Air M4 est 330 € moins chère qu’au lancement grâce aux offres du pré-Black Friday
item.description: Le MacBook Air M4 existe en deux versions avec un écran de 13,6 pouces ou 15,3 pouces. C'est cette dernière qui est concernée ici, avec 256 Go de stockage et 16 Go de mémoire vive, par la réduction en ce pré-Black Friday Amazon.

item.title: Trump’s $2,000 tariff ‘dividend’ post is likely to fuel the stimulus check rumor mill for months
item.description: Every time a public official suggests sending money to Americans, a deluge of online content designed to induce clicks and raise false hopes follows. With his tariff policies potentially under threat from the Supreme Court, President Trump over the weekend took to Truth Social to float the idea of doling out a $2,000 “dividend” to every person in America who is not high income. ...

item.title: Most companies still lag behind on AI targets—how can they catch Up?
item.description: Companies continue to invest in AI, but they’re struggling to demonstrate ROI. Here's how to change that.

item.title: Knicks player Miles McBride launches a location-sharing friendship app to rival Snap Map
item.description: Mmotion is a new friendship app that combines elements of location sharing with social discovery features to find nearby users with shared interests.

item.title: Picking up a PS5 bundle deal is the perfect way to save on the latest games this Black Friday – there are discounts on EA Sports FC 26, Battlefield 6, and more
item.description: These PS5 bundles are well worth checking out for Black Friday, especially if you're looking for ways to pick up the latest games at a significant saving.

item.title: Apple prépare bien un iPhone avec une caméra sous l’écran, et il arrive bientôt
item.description: Après des années de rumeurs et de concepts, Apple pourrait enfin franchir le cap du vrai « tout écran » sur iPhone. La marque prévoit d’enterrer l’encoche et d’intégrer la caméra frontale sous la dalle, une avancée qu’on attendait depuis longtemps, et qui pourrait débarquer plus tôt que prévu.

item.title: Incogni vs. Privacy Bee: Which data removal service should keep your info off the internet?
item.description: A detailed comparison between Incogni and Privacy Bee regarding features, pricing, customer support, user-friendliness, and reporting

item.title: iPhone perdu ou volé : attention à cette arnaque qui cherche à pirater votre compte Apple
item.description: Les voleurs d'iPhone ont une astuce pour prendre le contrôle de votre smartphone. Dès que vous déclarez votre smartphone perdu sur l'app Localiser, ils lancent une attaque de phishing redoutable pour vous voler vos identifiants Apple. Ces attaques se multiplient.

item.title: Sir Tim Berners-Lee doesn’t think AI will destroy the web
item.description: Today, I’m talking with a very special guest: Sir Tim Berners-Lee, the inventor of the World Wide Web. Tim is a legend in the history of the internet. He created HTML, the standard language for creating and structuring web pages, and the HTTP protocol that allows those pages to communicate using browsers and servers. It […]

item.title: Let’s talk about Pluribus
item.description: The lead-up to Pluribus has been very secretive. The basic premise - miserable woman is stuck in a world where everyone is happy - was known early on, but that was followed by cryptic trailers that didn't really reveal much else. But now we have a much better idea of what Pluribus is after the […]

item.title: Amazon Music allows users in Canada to chat and stream music with each other
item.description: Amazon Music now lets users in Canada create and join groups based on their favorite genres and artists.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Tuesday, November 11 (game #1387)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Tuesday, November 11 (game #618)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Tuesday, November 11 (game #884)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: How context engineering can save your company from AI vibe code overload: lessons from Qodo and Monday.com
item.description: As cloud project tracking software monday.com’s engineering organization scaled past 500 developers, the team began to feel the strain of its own success. Product lines were multiplying, microservices proliferating, and code was flowing faster than human reviewers could keep up. The company needed a way to review thousands of pull requests each month without drowning developers in tedium — or letting quality slip.That’s when Guy Regev, VP of R&D and head of the Growth and monday Dev teams, started experimenting with a new AI tool from Qodo, an Israeli startup focused on developer agents. What ...

item.title: A first look inside Netflix House, Disneyland for the rest of us
item.description: Netflix House, the streaming giant’s new, 100,000 sq. ft live entertainment space, is a bold, immersive vision for the future of the cineplex—and almost certainly coming to a mall near you. I don’t know the last time I flew somewhere to visit a mall.

item.title: Sapphire Sport spins out, rebrands as 359 Capital with $300M AUM
item.description: The newly independent 359 Capital is half-way through investing from $181 million second fund.

item.title: A new PlayStation State of Play is happening tomorrow, focused on announcements on 'games from Japan and across Asia'
item.description: PlayStation's State of Play Japan presentation is happening tomorrow. Here's how to watch, and potentially what to expect.

item.title: Wall Street set for gains as Senate takes initial steps to end the shutdown
item.description: Dow Jones futures gained 0.4% while Nasdaq futures rose 1.5%. Wall Street pointed toward strong gains before markets opened Monday as a bipartisan deal to end the federal government shutdown gained traction in the Senate, though it lacked any clear resolution to expiring health care subsidies that Democrats have been fighting for.Rising hopes for an end to the longest federal government shutdown in U.S. history pushed futures for the S&P 500 0.9% higher, while Dow Jones futures gained 0.4%. Nasdaq futures climbed 1.5% on the strength of the technology sector.Health insurers were among the lose...

item.title: CNN’s app is adding a ‘Shorts’ feed for bite-size videos
item.description: CNN is revamping its app’s homepage with a feed dedicated to short-form videos. The new “Shorts” tab houses a stream of clips with stories from CNN, allowing you to swipe through them like you would with TikTok or Instagram Reels. The CNN app already had a section for short-form videos in its “Watch” tab, but […]

item.title: Apple fans, you won't love this one: rumors suggest OLED will be exclusive to M6 MacBook Pro and Max models
item.description: Apple is rumored to be gearing up for its M6 chips in the latter stages of 2026, but only those who purchase the M6 Pro or M6 Max models may receive the rumored OLED redesign.

item.title: All Her Fault is Peacock’s most chilling thriller yet – here’s why everyone can’t stop talking about it
item.description: All Her Fault hits harder than you expect – here's why critics are calling it "worthy of a binge that carves a dent into your couch cushions".

item.title: Apple Fitness+ dans la galère : pourquoi la situation du service d’entrainement sportif n’est pas si dramatique
item.description: Pas assez d'abonnés, pas assez de revenus. Selon Mark Gurman, Apple étudierait actuellement avec attention le cas de son application d'exercices sportifs guidés Apple Fitness+, en vue d'une réorganisation. Toute mesure plus drastique serait (pour l'instant) écartée.

item.title: Samsung lance une assurance universelle sur tous vos appareils, mais pas (encore) en France
item.description: Le service Samsung Care+ évolue en Inde. Il protège désormais tous les produits Samsung, et plus seulement les smartphones. Une nouveauté que l'on aimerait voir venir en France.

item.title: Windows 10 : un bug prive des millions d’utilisateurs de mises à jour de sécurité
item.description: Le programme Extended Security Updates de Windows 10 doit offrir une année de protection supplémentaire après la fin du support officiel par Microsoft. Cependant, certains utilisateurs n'y ont toujours pas accès.

item.title: Google issues security alert: Your VPN app could be spyware in disguise
item.description: In a new security report, Google is warning users that many VPN apps and extensions are actually malicious software designed to steal your data, not protect it. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: Nintendo lance un site de compatibilité Switch 2, cinq mois après la sortie de la console
item.description: Bonne nouvelle pour les possesseurs de Switch 2 : Nintendo lance enfin un site pour vérifier si vos jeux Switch fonctionnent sur la nouvelle console.

item.title: The Washington Post confirms it suffered an Oracle-linked data breach
item.description: The Post joins Harvard University, Schneider Electric, and others in being struck by Cl0p and FIN11.

item.title: En Chine, Apple s’aligne sur la censure en supprimant deux apps LGBTQ+
item.description: Les applications de rencontre LGBTQ+ ne sont pas les bienvenues dans l'App Store et les boutiques Android en Chine. Apple en a retiré deux parmi les plus utilisées, sur instructions de l'appareil de censure chinois.

item.title: ‘It: Welcome to Derry’ Stars Kimberly Guerrero and James Remar on Episode 3’s Big Reveals
item.description: Childhood sweethearts reunite in the latest entry in HBO's Stephen King series, but the circumstances aren't exactly happy ones.

item.title: Avec 500 € de remise pré-Black Friday, le HP Victus 15 armé d’une RTX 5060 et d’un Ryzen AI 5 devient une machine gaming redoutable
item.description: Cet HP Victus 15 est un PC portable récent, datant de 2025, certifié Copilot+, qu'on retrouve en promo pour 899,99 euros sur Boulanger, au lieu de 1 399,99 euros pour le pré-Black Friday. On le trouve aussi 100 euros moins cher sur un autre site marchand, mais sans Windows préinstallé.

item.title: Arcane season 2 is about to celebrate its one-year anniversary – here are 3 big questions I want one of the best Netflix shows' birthday event to answer
item.description: Riot Games' 'Arcane Fanniversary' event is set to celebrate Arcane season 2's first birthday.

item.title: Cdiscount : les meilleures offres à scruter pendant ce pré-Black Friday
item.description: Cdiscount rejoint la course aux bonnes affaires avec son opération pré-Black Friday. Le site propose de belles réductions sur une large gamme de produits Tech, allant des smartphones aux téléviseurs, en passant par les consoles de jeux. Parmi la multitude d’offres, voici les plus intéressantes, celles qui valent vraiment le détour.

item.title: NVIDIA à la relance : sa prochaine génération de GPU serait déjà entrée en production
item.description: Dévoilée il y a quelques semaines à la GTC 2025, la « superpuce » Vera Rubin de Nvidia serait déjà entrée en production. Destinée à l'IA, au monde des supercalculateurs et des data-centers, cette dernière est censée se matérialiser à grande échelle fin 2026-début 2027.

item.title: La charge rapide tue-t-elle votre batterie de smartphone ? Un test de 500 cycles dévoile la vérité
item.description: On nous répète depuis des années d'éviter la charge rapide pour préserver nos batteries. Une chaîne YouTube a testé pendant 6 mois, dont des charges à 120 watts.

item.title: Windows 11 : l’outil Capture d’écran va ajouter une option d’édition indispensable
item.description: Microsoft travaille sur une option permettant à l'outil Capture d'écran de pouvoir éditer directement ses captures en y ajoutant du texte.

item.title: America’s cybersecurity defenses are cracking
item.description: It was late June, and something strange was happening on Arizona's online portal for political candidates. Images of the candidates were disappearing. Photos of the Iranian Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeini were popping up in their place. The state would later come to believe it was an attack from an Iranian government-affiliated group. When they first discovered […]...

item.title: The Seduction is the new HBO Max series you need to stream in November – and it’s as explicit as you’d expect
item.description: New French-language series The Seduction is HBO Max's latest offering, and I'm still blushing from all the sex and scandal.

item.title: Can't sign up for Windows 10's extended updates? Here's why that might be – and what you can do about it
item.description: Sticking with Windows 10, but worried because you can't get extended updates? You might have run into a bug.

item.title: Coros dévoile sa nouvelle montre de sport pas chère, la Coros Pace 4, avec écran Amoled, micro et design léger
item.description: Coros a dévoilé ce lundi sa Pace 4, nouvelle venue dans la gamme de montres running du constructeur, avec un prix de moins de 270 euros.

item.title: Remote driving startup Vay could grab up to $410M from Singapore’s Grab
item.description: Vay, a German startup offering remote-controlled rental cars, will get an investment of up to $410M from Singaporean super-app company Grab.

item.title: Senate takes preliminary step towards ending the government shutdown
item.description: The Senate voted 60–40 to advance compromise legislation, which does not include a guarantee of healthcare subsidies. The Senate took the first step to end the government shutdown on Sunday after a group of moderate Democrats agreed to proceed without a guaranteed extension of health care subsidies, angering many in their caucus who say Americans want them to continue the fight.In a test vote that is the first in a series of required procedural maneuvers, the Senate voted 60-40 to move toward passing compromise legislation to fund the government and hold a later vote on extending Affordable C...
